1.title: CHILDREN's MEDLEY - HILLARY CONFIDENTIAL - The Duplex 2-20-16

episode of.title: Hillary Confidential a Heart To Heart Cocktail Cabaret: LIVE (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

1.plot: Kelley Karel, "The Singing Hillary Clinton" tells us "Children are the same wherever you go. They're like music and love. It doesn't matter what color they are, where they're from, or whether they're rich or poor, they're beautiful, they are pure love." With Music Director/Secret Service Agent, Jason Wynn, directed by Chuck Karel.

2.title: I'LL ENJOY BEING YOUR GIRL - HILLARY CONFIDENTIAL - The Duplex

episode of.title: Hillary Confidential a Heart To Heart Cocktail Cabaret: LIVE (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

2.plot: Kelley Karel, "The Singing Hillary Clinton" lets us know what a pleasure it will be being "Your Girl" when you put her back in the White House. With Jason Wynn, Music Director/Secret Service Agent, Backup Singers, Samantha Northart and Justin Liebergen, directed by Chuck Karel.

3.title: ANTHEM - HILLARY CONFIDENTIAL - The Duplex NYC 4-8-16

episode of.title: Hillary Confidential a Heart To Heart Cocktail Cabaret: LIVE (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

3.plot: Kelley Karel, "The Singing Hillary Clinton", tells what she really feels. "This is who I am, this is what I feel, this is the truth." With Jason Wynn, Music Director/Secret Service Agent and Backup Singers, Samantha Northart and Justin Liebergen, directed by Chuck Karel.

4.title: WE CAN BE KIND - HILLARY CONFIDENTIAL - The Duplex NYC 4-8-16

episode of.title: Hillary Confidential a Heart To Heart Cocktail Cabaret: LIVE (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

4.plot: Kelley Karel, "The Singing Hillary Clinton" says if you see bigotry, oppose it, if you see violence, condemn it, if you see a bully, stand up to him. David Friedman's WE CAN BE KIND, with Jason Wynn, Music Director/Secret Service Agent, Backup Singers, Samantha Northart and Justin Liebergen, directed by Charles Karel.

5.title: NUTS - HILLARY CONFIDENTIAL - The Duplex NYC 4-8-16

episode of.title: Hillary Confidential a Heart To Heart Cocktail Cabaret: LIVE (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

5.plot: Kelley Karel, "The Singing Hillary Clinton" channels Trump and Carson, 2 idiots who drive her nuts with what they believe. With Jason Wynn, Music Director/Secret Service Agent, directed by Chuck Karel.

6.title: POWER of the DREAM - HILLARY CONFIDENTIAL - The Duplex NYC 4-8-16

episode of.title: Hillary Confidential a Heart To Heart Cocktail Cabaret: LIVE (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

6.plot: Kelley Karel, "The Singing Hillary Clinton" reminds us to remember whatever you dream, you can have. With Jason Wynn, music director, and backup singers, Samantha Northart and Justin Liebergen directed by Chuck Karel.

8.title: POOR WANDERING ME - HILLARY CONFIDENTIAL -The Duplex NYC 4-8-16

episode of.title: Hillary Confidential a Heart To Heart Cocktail Cabaret: LIVE (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

8.plot: Kelley Karel, "The Singing Hillary Clinton" tells Sarah Palin what it was really like being Secretary of State, icky food and all. With Music Director/Secret Service Agent, Jason Wynn, Backup Singers, Samantha Northart and Justin Liebergen, directed by Chuck Karel.

9.title: RICH FAMOUS and POWERFUL - HILLARY CONFIDENTIAL - The Duplex 4-8-16

episode of.title: Hillary Confidential a Heart To Heart Cocktail Cabaret: LIVE (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

9.plot: Kelley Karel, "The Singing Hillary Clinton" lets you know what she'd really like to tell you. With Jason Wynn, Music Director/Secret Service Agent, directed by Chuck Karel. Lyrics and Music, David Friedman.

10.title: HE's JUST MY BILL - HILLARY CONFIDENTIAL - The Duplex NYC 4-8-16

episode of.title: Hillary Confidential a Heart To Heart Cocktail Cabaret: LIVE (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

10.plot: Kelley Karel, "The Singing Hillary Clinton" tells us why she's so in love with Bill, ever since she first met him at Yale Law School. With Jason Wynn, Music Director/Secret Service Agent, directed by Chuck Karel.

11.title: SOME PEOPLE - HILLARY CONFIDENTIAL - The Duplex 4-8-2016

episode of.title: Hillary Confidential a Heart To Heart Cocktail Cabaret: LIVE (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

11.plot: Kelley Karel, "The Singing Hillary Clinton" on the campaign trail, lets us know it's okay for some people to bake cookies, but she doesn't know how. However, there's room for all of us choosing what we really want to do in this life in this great country. But she knows how to be POTUS. With Jason Wynn, Music Director/Secret Service Agent and directed by Chuck Karel.
